participant_1.background:
I am a 15 year old girl.
When i grow up , i want to be a veterinarian.
I get good grades in school.
I like field hockey and soccer.

participant_2.background:
I am a waitress at a local restaurant.
My favorite band is nirvana.
I am a casual dresser.
My car needs some repairs.
I am overall happy with life.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to play music, go to concerts, and read.
Cool! I love to play soccer and field hockey. I also like to read.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play the guitar and the piano. I also like to sing.
That's great! I play the guitar and the drums. I also sing.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play rock and blues music. I also like to play country music.
That's cool! I like to play classical music. I also like to play folk music.
That's great! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read science fiction and fantasy novels. I also like to read history books.
That's great! I like to read science fiction and fantasy novels too. I also like to read mystery novels.
That's awesome! What kind of concerts do you like to go to?
I like to go to rock concerts and blues concerts. I also like to go to country concerts.
That's great! I like to go to classical concerts and folk concerts. I also like to go to rock concerts.
That's awesome! We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be great! I would love to go to a concert with you.
